about_the_game:
Fireworks are in the air once again aboard the Alithea. One would think such a thing was a bad idea, but not the residents - they're here to celebrate! The robotic vacuum cleaners have been decorated as dragons to roam the halls and instill wonderment upon the ship's residents.

It's not only the robotic occupants who are taking part in the Lunar New Year, the residents are also invited to take part with a wide selection of Lunar New Year inspired outfits invoking the traditional spirits of Asia that they left behind long ago.

Happy new year!

Included Content:

  • Accessory: Hand Fan - Brown + Beige Version
  • Accessory: Hand Fan - Red + Gold Version
  • Accessory: Hand Fan - Beige + Pink - Sakura Flower
  • Headwear: Chinese Dragon Mask
  • Headwear: Lunar New Year Puppet Mask
  • Body & Legs: Lunar New Years Dress
  • Body & Legs: Lunar New Years 2-piece
  • Feet: Lunar New Year Feminine Shoes Black
  • Feet: Lunar New Year Feminine Shoes Red
  • Feet: Lunar New Year Masculine Shoes Black
  • Feet: Lunar New Year Masculine Shoes Red
  • Vruumba: Chinese Dragon Vruumba Color #1
  • Vruumba: Chinese Dragon Vruumba Color #2
  • Vruumba Antenna: Lunar New Years Lamp Antenna
  • Vruumba Thruster: Fireworks Effect

Fireworks are in the air once again aboard the Alithea. One would think such a thing was a bad idea, but not the residents - they're here to celebrate! The robotic vacuum cleaners have been decorated as dragons to roam the halls and instill wonderment upon the ship's residents.

It's not only the robotic occupants who are taking part in the Lunar New Year, the residents are also invited to take part with a wide selection of Lunar New Year inspired outfits invoking the traditional spirits of Asia that they left behind long ago.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone and headphones
